ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( AND( (ISPICKVAL(Status, "Scheduled")), (GDMFSL_Override_Block__c = FALSE) ), OR( CONTAINS(GDMFSL_SC_Block_Type__c, "ZB"), (GDMFSL_Delivery_Block__c = TRUE), (GDMFSL_Customer_Order_Block__c = TRUE), (AND( OR( (CONTAINS(GDMFSL_SC_Block_Type__c, "ZC")), (CONTAINS(GDMFSL_SC_Block_Type__c, "ZR")) ), (ISBLANK(GDMFSL_PO_Number__c)) )) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Account has credit block - SA Cannot be scheduled
